description: On the heels of the award-winning NFL 2010 and Let’s Golf, Gameloft now releases the best 3D tennis game on Palm Pre!  Live the life of a professional player on a world tour where the only goal is to become number one!  • 8 players entirely modeled in highly detailed 3D graphics. • From Paris to New York to Stockholm, play in 7 stadiums on 3 different surfaces – clay, grass and synthetic – each providing a different experience.  • Controls making the most of the Palm Pre capabilities. • Serve by tilting your Palm Pre! • A wide array of strokes for a deeper experience: Lob, drop shot, smash and more. • A Career mode that lets you join a tennis tour just like a real professional player.  Recommended for fans of arcade and simulation sports games.  Published and distributed by Gameloft.
